SELECT Schedule_Seq , TS.User_ID , User_Nm , Schedule_Title , Schedule_Type , Schedule_Start_Dt , Schedule_End_Dt , date_add(Schedule_End_Dt, interval 1 day) Schedule_End_Dt2 , Vacation_Gubun , TS.Delete_YN , TS.CREATE_ID , TS.CREATE_DT , TS.UPDATE_ID , TS.UPDATE_DT FROM TB_Schedule TS, TB_User TU WHERE Schedule_Start_Dt >= date_add(sysdate(), interval -12 month) AND Schedule_End_Dt <= date_add(sysdate(), interval 12 month) AND TS.User_ID = TU.User_ID AND TS.Delete_YN = 'N' AND TU.Delete_YN = 'N'

SELECT Schedule_Seq , TS.User_ID , User_Nm , Schedule_Title , Schedule_Type , IF(Schedule_Type =1,'정기휴가','공휴') scheduleTypeNm , Schedule_Start_Dt , Schedule_End_Dt , Vacation_Gubun , CASE WHEN Vacation_Gubun = '1' THEN '전일' WHEN Vacation_Gubun = '2' THEN '오전반차' ELSE '오후반차' END AS Vacation_GubunNm , DateDiff(Schedule_Start_Dt,TS.Create_Dt) DateDiffs , TS.Delete_YN , TS.CREATE_ID , TS.CREATE_DT , TS.UPDATE_ID , TS.UPDATE_DT FROM TB_Schedule TS, TB_User TU WHERE TS.User_id = #{userId} AND TS.Delete_YN = 'N' AND TU.Delete_YN = 'N' AND TS.User_ID = TU.User_ID
